title: Valley Fine Foods Recalls Meat and Poultry Products due to Possible Adulteration
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 11, 2018 Valley Fine Foods, a Forest City, N.C. establishment, is recalling approximately 35,516 pounds of heat-treated, not fully cooked meat and poultry products that may be adulterated due to presence of spoilage organisms that have rendered it unwholesome and unfit for human...
